page.title: 10WANSFORD VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The Village Hall has many uses. There are events that happen yearly and ones that are weekly. There is a flower show held once a year in Wansford and most villagers are involved with that. The Women's Institute use the hall once a year for a dinner, as do the Horticultural Society and the Evergreens. Several groups meet regularly in the Hall, like the playgroup which takes place 4 times a week. The youth club meets once a week, usually on Fridays or Saturdays. The people who hire out the hall pay a cost: the price depends on whoever is using the hall. The hall costs more if it is being used for commercial purposes _ wedding receptions and private parties, for example _ but if used by local groups it will cost less.
